name: ratesagents-main
description: Login area and other important things

scripts.compile-css-dev: node-sass --include-path client_side/src/scss --output-style nested --indent-type tab --indent-width 4 client_side/src/scss/main.scss client_side/dist/css/main.css
scripts.build-css-prod: npm run compile-css-prod && npm run autoprefix-css
scripts.copy-all-js: cp -rf client_side/src/js/vendor client_side/dist/js/; cp client_side/src/js/main.js client_side/dist/js/
scripts.mkdir-dist: mkdir -p client_side/dist/js/vendor; mkdir -p client_side/dist/images; mkdir -p client_side/dist/css/vendor; mkdir -p client_side/dist/fonts;
scripts.prep-dist: npm run clean-dist; npm run mkdir-dist;
scripts.build-dev: npm run prep-dist; npm run copy-fonts; npm run compile-css-dev; npm run compress-images; npm run copy-vendor-js; npm run copy-vendor-css
scripts.build-prod: npm run prep-dist; npm run copy-fonts; npm run build-css-prod; npm run compress-images; npm run compress-js; npm run copy-vendor-js; npm run copy-vendor-css
scripts.watch: nodemon -e scss,js,hbs --watch client_side/src --watch views --watch utils --watch middlewares --watch routes --watch config --watch app.js -x "npm run compile-css-dev && npm run compress-js && node app"

author: Grant Sherrick
